
                
                <p></p><div class="genxin">21点47分 试试央视频和淘宝<br>今晚20点开始，央视频APP<br>跟随春晚主持人口令，参与抽五粮液<br>全程有四轮抽奖 <br><br>抽奖时间<br>第一轮 20:49左右<br>第二轮 21:03左右<br>第三轮 22:08左右<br>第四轮 22:54左右<br>第五轮 23:33左右 <img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx3.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hy08g75skbj30kq4codup.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx3.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hy08g75skbj30kq4codup.jpg" class="qr-image"><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hy08g76325j30kq2t3gui.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hy08g76325j30kq2t3gui.jpg" class="qr-image"></div><p></p>
